record1.<1>:
Declare Function Get_property, Set_Property, Repository
Declare subroutine OIPI_Report, Set_Property
Win_Name = CtrlEntId[1,'.']
Selection_Type = Get_Property(CtrlEntId, 'DEFPROP')
Report_Type = Get_Property(Win_Name:".RB_P1_ITEM", 'DEFPROP')
Begin Case
      Case Report_type = 1
      		report = 'CUSTOMER'
            Begin Case
				Case Selection_Type = 1
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_POPUP", @WINDOW)
				Case Selection_Type = 2
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_MULTI_POPUP", @WINDOW)      
				Case Selection_Type = 3
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_MULTI_POPUP", @WINDOW)      				           
			End Case
      Case Report_type = 2
      		report = 'PRODUCT'
            Begin Case
				Case Selection_Type = 1
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**PRODUCT_POPUP_SINGLE", @WINDOW)       
				Case Selection_Type = 2
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**PRODUCT_POPUP", @WINDOW)      
				Case Selection_Type = 3
					 RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**PRODUCT_POPUP", @WINDOW)      				           
			End Case           
      Case Report_type = 3
            Report = "DATE"
            Begin Case
				Case Selection_Type = 1
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_POPUP", @WINDOW)
				Case Selection_Type = 2
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_MULTI_POPUP", @WINDOW)      
				Case Selection_Type = 3
				     RetVal = Repository("EXECUTE", @APPID<1>:"*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_MULTI_POPUP", @WINDOW)      				           
	           
			End Case           
End Case

if retval then
	@USER0 = retval
	@USER1 = report
*	x = Set_Property(@USER0,'TEXT',retval)
*	x = Set_Property(@USER2,'TEXT',report)
*	OIPI_Report(report,retval)
end

RETURN 0





* repos_key = @appid<1>:'*POPUP**CUSTOMER_ID_POPUP'
* keys = Repository('EXECUTE', repos_key, @WINdow)
